Package org.apache.camel.component.direct

The Direct Component which synchronously invokes all the consumers when a producer sends an exchange to the endpoint.

See: Description

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    DirectBlockingProducer
    The direct producer.
    DirectComponent
    The Direct Component manages DirectEndpoint and holds the list of named direct endpoints.
    DirectConsumer
    The direct consumer.
    DirectEndpoint
    The direct component provides direct, synchronous call to another endpoint from the same CamelContext.
    DirectProducer
    The direct producer.
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    DirectConsumerNotAvailableException
    Exception thrown when no consumers are available.

Package org.apache.camel.component.direct Description

The Direct Component which synchronously invokes all the consumers when a producer sends an exchange to the endpoint. This also known as strait through processing.
